conclusion: Need to analyze flow patterns and baffle positions to determine which container liquid will flow into.
Baffles are labeled A, B, C, D, E, F, and G and positioned at the top of the image.
Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D.
Liquid will flow into the container directly below the baffles.
Container E is positioned at the bottom of the image.
Container F is positioned above Container E.
Container G is positioned above Container F.
Liquid will flow into Container G.
